resources.string: If the location still fails after getting permission, please close the application and open it again to update the location again.
If there is no data, remove the widget and add a new one
This APP only has a launcher widget, click the widget to update immediately, usually automatically update once an hour. Github@JARK006
Please go to settings to enable location permission
Location SDK provided by Amap.com, weather data from \"Qweather.com\" and "caiyunapp.com"
Please go to settings to enable notification permission
